jparsec.time.calendar

Class HinduOldLunar

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.time.calendar.HinduOldLunar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HinduOldLunar
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Implements the Old Hindu Lunar calendar. See Calendrical Calculations for reference.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
